ygData.subject: Aqua Lungs ARE worth it(read)
ygData.msgSnippet: the charges issue that was brought up before...that is an old bug that effected staves of the observer and ..well..just about ALL charged items...looks like
ygData.messageBody:
the charges issue that was brought up before...that is an old bug that
effected staves of the observer and ..well..just about ALL charged
items...looks like they have another "patch" to make now ;p ...so
anyways...a friend tested the Lung yesterday...50 charges of an effect that
lasts ALMOST 30 MINUTES! ppl WILL buy Lungs...AND to top it off...they can
use say, 49 of the charges and THEN get a rebreather (supplying their old
aqua lung for the finished product) so basically rebreathers can just be
"upgrades"." personally i think this is really cool ;) AND it gives us a
chance to make good cash and have a satisfied cuztomer base while postponing
the inevitable "upgrade" everyone is gonna want so we can actually get our
skill lvl high enough to create the rebreather :)
-Ranth
